titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning God's foreknowledge, and man's free agency wherein their seeming opposition is reconciled, and real consistency demonstrated from the Holy Scriptures, and arguments thence deduced.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Joseph, theologian.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning God's foreknowledge, and man's free agency wherein their seeming opposition is reconciled, and real consistency demonstrated from the Holy Scriptures, and arguments thence deduced.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Joseph, theologian.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of God's foreknowledge, and man's free agency.
Wing gives "A discourse on Gods foreknowledge" as title.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
